scripts.generate: npx prisma generate && npx ts-node scripts/mergeGraphQLSchemas.ts
scripts.dev: npx prisma generate && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/cdk_prisma?schema=cdk_prisma' npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/cdk_prisma?schema=cdk_prisma' npx vite-node ./graphqlserver/server.ts --watch -- --schema prisma/generated/prisma-appsync/schema.gql --watchers '[{"watch":["**/*.prisma","*.prisma"],"exec":"npx prisma generate && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:15432/cdk_prisma?schema=cdk_prisma' npx prisma db push --accept-data-loss && touch ./graphsqlserver/server.ts"}]'
scripts.deploy: cdk synth && cdk bootstrap && cdk deploy
